item.title: How to stop a runny nose?
item.description:
@1336.9 wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:18, topic:305646”][quote author=1336.9 link=topic=401873.msg2979161#msg2979161 date=1254503615]
ok why did you all have to do that?

after 1 person posted it you dont have to repeat it… its just annoying

no wonder why they’ll call mscps retarted, you keep quoting shit acting like youre smart
[/quote]
No wonder why they call all of moparscape retarded, you keep quoting shit acting like you’re smart.
Retarded*

And if we are so retarded, then why is a Moparscaper’s grammar better than yours?

@Topic;
Take cough medicine, or keep blowing your nose.[/quote]Oh don’t worry about my grammar, I can talk like that too.

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop a runny nose?

@Topic
You can’t really stop it but just kind of get in a warm place, you usually have colds and runny noses when you’re cold.[/quote] I thought u get a runny nose in the hot weather.

item.title: How to stop a runny nose?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Sabia, post:5, topic:305646”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=401873.msg2978499#msg2978499 date=1254445654]
Blow your nose to the point where you can’t blow anymore (The point where you can’t blow anymore <— That’s what she said XD) then the next time you feel snot starting to run down your nose, give a big snort, swallow down some of the mucus, and tilt your head up slightly. This is what I did when I had the cold a few weeks ago, it worked.
[/quote]

K ill try thanks. Cause I can never sleep with runny nose[/quote]

Pop a couple Nyquil.

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop a runny nose?

item.title: How to stop a runny nose?
item.dc:creator: @Sabia Sabia
item.description:
@Sabia wrote:

r0ckstar96:

Blow your nose to the point where you can’t blow anymore (The point where you can’t blow anymore <— That’s what she said XD) then the next time you feel snot starting to run down your nose, give a big snort, swallow down some of the mucus, and tilt your head up slightly. This is what I did when I had the cold a few weeks ago, it worked.

K ill try thanks. Cause I can never sleep with runny nose

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop a runny nose?

item.title: How to stop a runny nose?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Blow your nose to the point where you can’t blow anymore (The point where you can’t blow anymore <— That’s what she said XD) then the next time you feel snot starting to run down your nose, give a big snort, swallow down some of the mucus, and tilt your head up slightly. This is what I did when I had the cold a few weeks ago, it worked.

Read full topic
